channel.title: Turkey on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Turkey on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Roasted Turkey Recipes For The Holidays
item.description: Fill your house with the aroma of our festive oven roasted turkey. Wonderful for family celebrations and Holiday meals. Oven Roasted Turkey Ingredients 20-25 lb turkey (Thawed if frozen 2-3 days in fridge) rinse under cold water before cooking 3 tbs rubbed sage 3 tsp Chef Frankâ€™s Seasoning 3 tbsp melted butter 2 c water Roasted Turkey Directions In large roasting pan place turkey, breast side up. Brush with melted butter, then rub with sage.
